activities: eCustoms develops, deploys and supports trade compliance solutions to all sectors of global trade. Information collected is used to provide our customers with access to restricted areas of the eCustoms website. eCustoms takes appropriate steps to protect the information of individuals from unauthorized access or disclosure. eCustoms will not  provide this information to any Third Party without the expressed written consent of the provider of the information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Data regarding our customers' personnel who are users of our SAAS software, plus the personal data they submit to the software regarding their trading partners and employees for export compliance screening and executing trade transactions
recoursemech: The American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program).
